name: Handball Manager - TEAM
description: Your know how and feeling decides about win or loss. Send your team out for trainingscamps or increase the bonus and motivate your guys for unbelieveable performances. Maintain and enlarge your hall, negotiate with ad partners and if everything runs smoothly enjoy your fame.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7SP1, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel / AMD 1.5 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7SP1, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel / AMD 2 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 430 / Radeon 4500 or better Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
